Upakūsita，at J．II，134 is perhaps faulty for °kūḷita，which is suggested by C．expln． “kukkule jhāmo” and also by v．l．°kuṭhita （for kuṭṭhita boiled，sweltering，hot）．The variant （gloss） °kūjita may have the same origin，viz．°kūḷita，was however interpreted （v．l．BB．） by °kupita （meaning “shaken，disturbed by fire”）．（Page 139）
